text: Stracciatella is a term used for three different types of Italian food: *Stracciatella (soup), an egg drop soup popular in central Italy *Stracciatella (ice cream), a gelato variety with chocolate flakes, inspired by the soup *Stracciatella di bufala, a variety of soft Italian cheese from the Apulia region using Italian buffalo milk. Category:Italian words and phrases
title: Stracciatella
